name: Researcher
ability: You start knowing an in-play Townsfolk. When they die, skip a day.

name: Conspiracist
ability: On your first day, publicly choose four evil characters: that night, learn how many are in play.

name: Capsule Maker
ability: On your first night, choose a day number. That day, if alive, you may consult the Storyteller to learn something helpful.

name: Watchmaker
ability: On your first night, the Demon chooses a player to mark. Each night N, learn the alignment of the player N steps clockwise.

name: Lab Rat
ability: Each night, if your neighbors are different alignments, skip a day.

name: Analyst
ability: Each night, learn either the Demon or a player that was responsible for time travel today.

name: Officer
ability: Each night, choose a living player: if they were responsible for time travelling since dawn, you learn this and reverse the change.

name: Prescient
ability: Each night*, choose a character: learn whether they died since dawn. The first time the Demon kills you, wake once more: if you choose the Prescient, you are resurrected.

name: Time Traveller
ability: Once per game, visit the Storyteller to return to the previous day.

name: Linchpin
ability: After the Demon kills you, one Good and one Evil player might be resurrected.

name: Speedster
ability: When you nominate an Evil player, skip a day.

name: Sentry
ability: Each night N, if the player N steps clockwise from you is good, they are safe from evil abilities.

name: Immortal
ability: Doomsday cannot begin while you live.

name: Grandfather
ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose a living player. If they are an Outsider or Minion, your team loses.

name: Theorist
ability: Each night, choose a number. If it follows a secret rule, skip a day. Once per game, during the day, privately guess that rule: learn if you are correct.

name: Alien
ability: If you die, the Demon chooses two players: they become new characters of their type but do not learn this.

name: Butterfly
ability: Once per game, a player "mad" that you are an Outsider might become evil.

name: Looper
ability: Each night, choose two neighboring players: they receive the previous night's information (if any).

name: Anomaly
ability: Each night, choose a player: they misregister to everything tonight. If they are executed tomorrow, skip a day.

name: Inhibitor
ability: You start knowing which players might cause time travel. Each night, choose a player to suppress.

name: Reality Tear
ability: If you are executed, skip to Doomsday.

name: The Harbinger
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You may also choose to skip a day. DOOMSDAY: Choose two players instead.

name: The Unraveled
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [+1 Outsider] DOOMSDAY: Good players gain the Grandfather ability (all players learn this)..

name: The Observer
ability: Each night*, choose a player that voted yesterday: they die. At dusk, if nobody voted, evil wins. DOOMSDAY: All Townsfolk are poisoned.

name: The Infinite
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. One of your living good neighbors is poisoned (you learn who). DOOMSDAY: Each dusk, skip backwards. If your poisoned player is executed, evil wins.

name: The Clocktower
ability: Each dawn, the Storyteller announces the current day number. If the day number has exceeded the number of living players, the Demon's Doomsday ability activates.
